title: CreatePayment
description: This service allows contract customers to charge the cost of the order to a different charge account within their organisation.

order_id.description: The identifier for the order generated by Australia Post.

payment_method.description: The intended method of payment, valid values are CHARGE_TO_ACCOUNT.

payment_reference.description: A unique reference for the payment, generated by the merchant. This value must be unique across all payment.

attributes.description: A collection of key / value pairs attributes for each payment method.

account-number.description: The charge account number in which the cost of the order will be charged against.
